ResourceHeader.Description:
Pulse Height Analyzer matrix data for a single Solar Energetic Particle event
	from the Ulysses:HISCALE instrument.  Using the PHA data, one can quickly and 
	very accurately determine composition.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Thomas P. Armstrong, Fundamental Technologies LLC

InformationURL.Name: Explaination of HISCALE print-groups and CSV file nomenclature.
InformationURL.Description:
The Explanation.html page at Fundamental Technologies describes how the
          numeric data from the Ulysses HISCALE instrument are divided into different
          print-groups, the nomenclature of the ASCII-based comma-separated variable
          (CSV) files, and how those files can be accessed.

AccessURL.Name: Ulysses HISCALE PHA Event Data
AccessURL.Description:
Parent directory containing the PHA event data for the Ulysses/HISCALE instrument
	  for the entire mission.

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: Thomas P. Armstrong, Fundamental Technologies LLC

Parameter.Name: Time for the record
Parameter.Description:
Time for the record given in year, day of year, hour, min, and decimal seconds.
        The given time represents the beginning of the event interval.

Parameter.Name: Number of Events
Parameter.Description: Number of C/D pairs contained in this event file.

Parameter.Name: Event time offset
Parameter.Description: Time offset for a given C/D pair in hundredths of a second

Parameter.Name: Sector
Parameter.Description: Sector, 1-8, in which the C/D event pair occurs.

Parameter.Name: C1 Digitized Height
Parameter.Description: Digitized pulse height from the first sampling of the C detector.

Parameter.Name: D1 Digitized Height
Parameter.Description: Digitized pulse height from the first sampling of the D detector.

Parameter.Name: C2 Digitized Height
Parameter.Description: Digitized pulse height from the second sampling of the C detector.

Parameter.Name: D2 Digitized Height
Parameter.Description: Digitized pulse height from the second sampling of the D detector.

Parameter.Name: C1 Energy
Parameter.Description: Deposited energy from the first sampling of the C detector.

Parameter.Name: D1 Energy
Parameter.Description: Deposited energy from the first sampling of the D detector.

Parameter.Name: C2 Energy
Parameter.Description: Deposited energy from the second sampling of the C detector.

Parameter.Name: D2 Energy
Parameter.Description: Deposited energy from the second sampling of the D detector.

Parameter.Name: Priority Schedule
Parameter.Description:
Schedule for species priority:
	  0 - Fe, O, He, H
	  1 - O, Fe, H, He
	  2 - H, Fe, O, He
	  3 - He, Fe, O, H

Parameter.Name: Event 1 Channel
Parameter.Description: Channel which triggered the first event pair, W1-W8.

Parameter.Name: Event 2 Channel
Parameter.Description: Channel which triggered the second event pair, W1-W8.
